title: Workflow Catalog
description: Comprehensive catalog of all available system workflows

workflows.name: Agent Development
workflows.description: Multi-step workflow for developing AI agents from design through deployment.

workflows.name: Build LangChain Agent
workflows.description: Build an AI agent with LangChain.

workflows.name: Migrate Skill to Jinja2
workflows.description: How to migrate an existing skill to the new Jinja2 template format.

workflows.name: Multi-Agent Development
workflows.description: Multi-agent system development workflow including agent design, coordination setup, communication patterns, and orchestration.

workflows.name: Feature Development
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for developing new features from specifications through to completion.

workflows.name: LLM App Development
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for developing production-ready LLM applications from prototype to production, including evaluation.

workflows.name: Next.js Feature Development
workflows.description: This workflow guides the development of new features in Next.js applications, following a systematic approach from design to deployment.

workflows.name: Fiori App Development
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for developing Fiori Elements applications in SAP S/4HANA. Covers CDS data modeling, service definition, UI annotation, and deployment.

workflows.name: CAP Service Development
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for developing SAP Cloud Application Programming Model (CAP) services. Covers CDS modeling, service implementation, and testing.

workflows.name: RAP Development
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for developing RESTful ABAP Programming Model (RAP) business objects in SAP S/4HANA. Covers CDS modeling, behavior definition, and service projection.

workflows.name: RAP with Draft
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for developing RAP business objects with draft handling. Covers data model, behavior definition, draft enablement, and UI integration.

workflows.name: .NET API Development
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for developing production-ready ASP.NET Core APIs with Entity Framework Core, authentication, and Swagger documentation.

workflows.name: .NET Microservices Setup
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for designing and implementing microservices architectures with .NET. This workflow covers service boundaries, communication patterns, and infrastructure setup.

workflows.name: FastAPI Development
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for developing production-ready FastAPI applications with SQLAlchemy async patterns, Pydantic validation, and Alembic migrations.

workflows.name: Spring Microservice Development
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for developing production-ready Spring Boot microservices with JPA, REST APIs, testing, security, and observable metrics.

workflows.name: Agent Testing
workflows.description: Agent testing workflow covering unit tests with mocks, integration tests, and LLM evaluation. Ensures agents behave consistently and meet requirements.

workflows.name: Coordination Testing
workflows.description: Multi-agent coordination testing and validation workflow. Covers handoff verification, conflict resolution, result aggregation, and deadlock detection.

workflows.name: TDD Cycle
workflows.description: Test-Driven Development workflow implementing the Red-Green-Refactor cycle. Guides developers through writing failing tests, implementing code, and refactoring.

workflows.name: BDD Driven Development
workflows.description: Behavior-Driven Development workflow that starts with stakeholder-readable Gherkin scenarios and translates them into executable tests.

workflows.name: Quality Gate
workflows.description: Automated quality gate workflow that enforces code quality standards before merge. Runs comprehensive checks including linting, testing, security scanning, and coverage analysis.

workflows.name: Code Review
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for performing structured code reviews covering correctness, style, design, performance, security, and test coverage.

workflows.name: Backtest Validation
workflows.description: Strategy backtesting workflow with walk-forward analysis and Monte Carlo simulation. Covers data preparation, backtesting execution, performance metrics, and robustness checks.

workflows.name: CI/CD Pipeline
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for managing continuous integration and deployment pipelines. Covers build, test, security scanning, artifact generation, and deployment stages.

workflows.name: SAP CI/CD Pipeline
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for setting up CI/CD pipelines for SAP applications. Covers build automation, testing, transport management, and deployment using SAP BTP or on-premise tools.

workflows.name: GitHub Actions CI
workflows.description: GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline setup and maintenance workflow. Covers workflow creation, test automation, linting, dependency caching, and deployment triggers.

workflows.name: Java CI/CD Pipeline
workflows.description: Comprehensive CI/CD pipeline workflow for Java/Spring Boot applications using Maven/Gradle, Testcontainers, Docker/Jib, and GitHub Actions.

workflows.name: Azure Deployment
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for deploying .NET applications to Azure cloud services including App Service, Container Apps, SQL Database, and Key Vault.

workflows.name: BTP Service Deployment
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for deploying SAP applications to SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP). Covers build configuration, MTA assembly, and deployment to Cloud Foundry.

workflows.name: Deployment Workflow
workflows.description: Blockchain deployment workflow from testnet through mainnet. Covers build verification, testnet deployment, mainnet preparation, and post-deployment verification.

workflows.name: ML Deployment Pipeline
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for deploying machine learning models to production including model export, containerization, endpoint testing, and monitoring setup.

workflows.name: Release Management
workflows.description: Systematic workflow for managing software releases including version bumping, changelog generation, tagging, and deployment artifact publication.

workflows.name: Repository Maintenance
workflows.description: Automated workflow for full repository audits, structural cleaning, and artifact synchronization.

workflows.name: ML Experiment
workflows.description: ML experiment workflow from hypothesis formation through results analysis. Covers experiment setup, training, tracking, and evaluation using MLflow or Weights & Biases.

workflows.name: Model Training Pipeline
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for training machine learning models from data preparation through hyperparameter optimization to model registry.

workflows.name: Model Evaluation
workflows.description: ML model evaluation workflow covering metrics selection, model comparison, and reporting. Supports classification, regression, and ranking tasks.

workflows.name: Alpha Factor Mining
workflows.description: Step-by-step guide for finding and testing new predictive features (technical, fundamental, alternative).

workflows.name: Research
workflows.description: Multi-source research workflow using RAG, web search, docs, and GitHub.

workflows.name: RAG Pipeline Development
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for developing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems. Covers document ingestion, embedding generation, vector store setup, and retrieval optimization.

workflows.name: Prompt Iteration
workflows.description: Iterative prompt engineering and optimization cycle. Covers prompt design, testing, evaluation, and refinement using structured feedback.

workflows.name: Smart Contract Development
workflows.description: Smart contract development workflow with design, implementation, testing, and audit preparation. Covers Solidity/Ethereum best practices.

workflows.name: Solana Development
workflows.description: Solana program development with Anchor framework. Covers program design, instruction implementation, testing, and deployment to Devnet/Mainnet.

workflows.name: DeFi Development
workflows.description: DeFi protocol development with AMM, lending, and staking patterns. Covers protocol design, smart contract implementation, and frontend integration.

workflows.name: Smart Contract Audit
workflows.description: Comprehensive security audit workflow for smart contracts covering static analysis, vulnerability scanning, gas optimization, and manual review.

workflows.name: Security Audit Workflow
workflows.description: Smart contract security audit workflow covering scope definition, static analysis, manual review, penetration testing, and report generation.

workflows.name: Backlog Refinement
workflows.description: Systematic workflow for maintaining a healthy product backlog through prioritization, estimation, story refinement, and dependency analysis.

workflows.name: Sprint Planning
workflows.description: Systematic workflow for planning sprints, including backlog review, capacity calculation, story selection, and sprint goal definition.

workflows.name: Daily Standup
workflows.description: Automated workflow for facilitating daily standup meetings, including status collection, blocker identification, and action item tracking.

workflows.name: Sprint Closure
workflows.description: Systematic workflow for closing sprints, including status review, velocity calculation, incomplete item handling, and retrospective generation.

workflows.name: Manage Schedule
workflows.description: Manage daily schedule and communications.

workflows.name: Confluence Feature
workflows.description: Confluence-documented feature development workflow. Covers requirements from Confluence, design documentation, implementation, and status updates.

workflows.name: Jira Bugfix
workflows.description: Jira-triggered bugfix workflow from ticket analysis through resolution. Covers ticket fetching, root cause analysis, implementation, and ticket update.

workflows.name: Master System Orchestration
workflows.description: Supreme command entity for strategic decomposition and multi-agent orchestration.

workflows.name: Multi-Agent Orchestration
workflows.description: Workflow for designing, implementing, and deploying multi-agent AI systems. Covers topology selection, agent implementation, and interaction protocols.

workflows.name: AI System Design
workflows.description: Comprehensive workflow for designing AI systems including requirements analysis, architecture selection, cost estimation, and feasibility study.

workflows.name: Security Audit
workflows.description: Comprehensive security audit workflow that systematically reviews code for vulnerabilities, checks dependencies, validates permissions, and generates a report.

workflows.name: Incident Response
workflows.description: Systematic workflow for responding to production incidents. Covers detection, triage, mitigation, resolution, and post-mortem analysis.

workflows.name: Debug Pipeline
workflows.description: Systematic workflow for debugging CI/CD pipeline failures. This workflow demonstrates the Cursor Agent Factory workflow structure.

workflows.name: Trading Strategy Pipeline
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for developing, validating, and deploying algorithmic trading strategies. Covers hypothesis formation, backtesting, and paper trading.

workflows.name: Strategy Development
workflows.description: Trading strategy development workflow from research through validation. Covers hypothesis formation, entry/exit rules, risk management, and backtesting.

workflows.name: Logistics Chain Workflow
workflows.description: Cross-module workflow for order-to-cash, procure-to-pay, or make-to-stock. For consultants and developers designing or implementing end-to-end processes.

workflows.name: MM Development
workflows.description: Material Management (MM) workflow.

workflows.name: SD Development
workflows.description: Sales and Distribution (SD) workflow.

workflows.name: LE Development
workflows.description: Logistics Execution (LE) workflow.

workflows.name: EWM Development
workflows.description: Extended Warehouse Management (EWM) workflow.

workflows.name: FI Development
workflows.description: Financial Accounting (FI) workflow.
